Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

OOC: I'll assume you meant Lord Elder.
   
  ::Lord Elder::
   
  Elder leaves Kup and walks through the corridors of the base with Windlord presumebly with him.
   
  Elder opens a comm channel.
   
  Elder: Lord Perseus this is Lord Elder. Kup and I have come up with a plan that i wish to discuss with you.
   
  ::Jhiaxus-Hevn/Scorponok-Zarak::
   
  The Hevn puppet lands outside the base of Hydras' Predacons.
   
  Apon arriving Scorponok opens the main doors and allows the puppet to come to the room with Hydras, Scorponok and Jhiaxus controlling Hevn.
   
  The puppet deactivates the cloaking device and signal masker. The puppet drops the uncouncious Nightlight on the ground.
   
  Jhiaxus takes off the control helmet and allows it to drop to the ground. He looks to Hydras with a smile.
   
  Jhiaxus: Mission complete.
   
  Scorponok transforms to scorpion mode in a restful position as Zarak detaches and changes to his humanoid form, removing the helmet to his exo-suit.
   
  Zarak: That went smoothly. I'm surprised but pleased.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Windlord/Nightlight:

Windlord nodded to Lord Perseus and was ready to follow it. He was a 
warrior always ready to fight then he was ready for a new mission.

***********

Nighlight:

Nightlight moaned weakly.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Kup/Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder: I'll go and present our plan to Lord Perseus. Kup, if you 
don't mind, could you remain here and keep an eye on Hot Rod and 
Remus.
> 
> Kup: Will do. I'll be fine here. Have Windlord go with you.
> 
> Elder nodded and looked to Windlord to see if he was ready to go.
> 
> ::Jhiaxus-Hevn::
> 
> The Hevn puppet attaches the cloaking device and signal masker 
to himself and Nightlight.
> 
> Hevn: Hehehehehe. So easy. Beast mode!
> 
> The puppet changes to its unusual beast mode and picks up 
Nightlight's limp, uncouncious body. He flies off towards Hydras' 
base. They are invisible to both optics and sensors.



                         

       
---------------------------------
